content: AlphaZero is very particular about its openings – it only plays the best of the best, and how it approaches them has led to new advancements in opening theory.
translations: ita:AlphaZero è molto esigente riguardo alle sue aperture﹕ riproduce solo il meglio del meglio e il modo in cui si avvicina
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
